intro:
Two sisters arrive, bringing trouble along!?
A thrilling life surrounded by beautiful sisters begins!
description:
◆Story
The protagonist Yuuki Fujino is living alone in the city after moving from the countryside.
One day, his two childhood friends suddenly show up at his door!

Minato and Akiho, his childhood friends,
reveal that they were almost forced into a marriage meeting with a pervert who insisted on "marrying them both at the same time"...
Feeling sorry for them, Yuuki decides to let them stay and starts a shared life together.

One day, Yuuki returns home from his part-time job to find a suspicious person clinging to his apartment door's peephole.
"Who’s there?!" Yuki demands. The suspicious man angrily shouts, "What’s your relationship with my women?!"
From this, Yuuki realizes the man is likely the pervert who caused the sisters to run away and attempts to detain him, but the man escapes.

Now that the sisters’ location has been exposed, Yuuki’s home is no longer safe.
Who is this mysterious stalker? And what will become of their daily life...?


◆Characters
・Minato Togano
The older sister of the Togano family is usually strong-willed and selfish, often bossing Yuuki around.
She's not good at household chores, leaving most of them to her younger sister, Akiho.
However, she occasionally shows glimpses of kindness.

・Akiho Togano
Minato's younger sister is kind, caring, and an excellent cook.
With her gentle and easygoing personality, she unwittingly soothes Yuuki.
Her style surpasses that of her older sister.

・Kaori Mikanagi
A cheerful and energetic senior at Yuuki’s part-time job.
Her playful personality often leads her to tease Yuuki for fun.
With her tomboyish nature, she’s also popular among the female customers at work.

・Yuuki Fujino
The protagonist, living alone in the city after moving from the countryside.
Surrounded mostly by older people, he naturally ends up in the "younger brother" role wherever he goes.
His life takes a turn when his older childhood friends, the Togano sisters, suddenly move in, starting an unexpected life together...
